name: GetComputedPricebypricetable
description:
Gets the Computed Price, which is the price after all the steps in the Pricing pipeline, for an SKU in a specific price table or trade policy. 

## Response body example

```json
{
    "tradePolicyId": "1",
    "listPrice": 30,
    "costPrice": 76.92,
    "sellingPrice": 18.9,
    "priceValidUntil": "2018-12-20T18:12:14Z"
}
```

Content-Type.description: Describes the type of the content being sent.

Accept.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

$ul: **listPrice**: Trade Policy List Price, also known as "from" price.
**priceValidUntil**: Date until when the computed price will be valid, due to price scheduling. If no price scheduling applies, this will be set a year from the current time.
**sellingPrice**: Computed Price before applying coupons, promotions and taxes. This price may change before reaching the shelf.
